services.title: General Medicine
services.description: Comprehensive primary healthcare services for all ages including routine checkups and preventive care.

services.title: Cardiology
services.description: Heart and cardiovascular system diagnosis and treatment by certified cardiologists.

services.title: Pediatrics
services.description: Specialized medical care for infants, children, and adolescents up to 18 years.

services.title: Dermatology
services.description: Skin, hair, and nail disorders treatment with advanced dermatological procedures.

services.title: Orthopedics
services.description: Bone, joint, and muscle injuries treatment and surgical procedures.

services.title: Emergency Care
services.description: 24/7 emergency medical services for urgent and critical health conditions.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Excellent care and professional staff. Dr. Smith helped me recover completely from my back injury.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: The cardiology team saved my life. Outstanding medical expertise and compassionate care throughout.

testimonials.name: Emily Davis
testimonials.text: My kids love Dr. Rodriguez. She makes every visit comfortable and explains everything clearly.
